DataElement.preferredName: Minimal Residual Disease Negative Post Cycle Therapeutic Procedure Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not minimal residual disease was negative post cycle of therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Minimal Residual Disease Negative Post Cycle Therapeutic Procedure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Absence of residual disease based on laboratory techniques._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Absence of residual disease based on laboratory techniques.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.

Concepts.definition: Absence of residual disease based on laboratory techniques.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.

Property.preferredDefinition: An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unk ND NA Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, unknown, not done or not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Done Not Applicable Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.:Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
